name: rug
notes:
**rug / a free gift for you!**
it was september 2015 that i released the first pattern from ravelry. two years have passed since then, and i have been in the third year now.
my pattern is oversize and a little unique... however, many kind people tried it, and they said that "junko's pattern is fun". ? thank you so much! i am very happy to hear that!  it is thanks to everyone's warm support that i can continue designing the knit wear now.
this pattern is a little gift of my gratitude for you all. **this pattern is free**. i am glad if you liked this pattern, and i'm wishing this sweater will warm your winter!
-
-
**yarn**
zealana tui
for the zealana home page see,
https://www.zealana.com/luxury-knitting-yarns/artisan-tui/

approximately 
main color ( mc ) 
t01 natural : 7.2 balls

contrast color ( cc ) 
t02 black : 1.6 balls
-
-

**needles**
40" or longer circular needles for magic loop method.
us 9 ( 5.50mm )
for a video tutorial on magic loop method see, 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=idspc0ezpnk&sns=em
-
-

**gauge**
15 sts and 17 rows = 10 cm ( 4" )
in stockinette stitch and color work with us 9 ( 5.50mm ) needle or needle size needed to get gauge.
-
-

**size / one size**
a ) neck circ 56cm / 22.0"
b ) max bust circ 126cm / 49.6"
c ) hem circ 124cm / 48.8"
d ) max arm circ  44cm / 17.3"
e ) wrist circ 26cm / 10.2"
f ) front body length 56cm / 22.0"
g ) back body length 64cm / 25.2"
h ) neck to wrist length 78cm / 30.7"
-
-

**notions**
stitch markers
holders
-
-

**pattern notes**
this sweater is knitted top-down using magic loop method.
-
-

**japanese short row method**
for a video tutorial on japanese short row method see, 
https://youtu.be/l4mdvjavmm0
-
-

**special thanks!**
eylul yarns  https://eylulyarns.com
yuri and kumiko!
